verbose_text: Midgut isolates of NTM were able to degrade galactosyl derivatives of sucrose, such as raffinose (XREF_TABLE), which is the second more abundant sugar in soybean seeds and is considered responsible of reducing digestibility because it has some activity as protease inhibitor [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: NTM were able to degrade galactosyl derivatives of sucrose
